content: burger crochet pattern hello i m zurana this pattern is part of my amigurumi play food project which is a collection of all kinds of delicious foods and treats my goal is to create life-size and realistic looking amigurumi using my choice of yarn alize cotton gold if you have any questions suggestions or spot any mistakes please feel free to contact me happy crocheting <3 this pattern is designed by atelier zurana you may not copy alter or sell this pattern in any way you may sell finished items using this pattern materials that i used yarn alize cotton gold color/ code o buns caramel 499 beige 262 o patty dark brown 26 o lettuce grass 126 o tomato red 56 o cheese slice mustard 2 o pickles acid 129 green 35 can be substitute with grass 126 and vice versa o onion white 55 2 5mm crochet hook yarn needle stitch marker polyester filling scissors abbreviations us terms magic_ring magic_ring chain -
